website_summaries.verdict: A fireproof battery bag that enables you to safeguard your Lipo batteries while they are charging, in transit or in storage.
pros: Constructed from silicone-coated fiberglass to protect your Lipo batteries against fire, heat and explosions
Bag comes with aluminum foil on the inside for maximum protection
Provides sufficient room for about 30 Lipo batteries
cons: Smaller and less durable than many comparable bags

customer_reviews.title: Well made! Fits exactly inside an ammo can!
customer_reviews.text: Great product! Will fit lots of LiPo batteries. My favorite feature is it's size: it fits perfectly inside a .50 cal ammo can. Be sure to drill holes in the top of the can to allow for venting of pressure in case of a fire.
customer_reviews.author: CrazyCal

customer_reviews.title: Big and lots of capacity
customer_reviews.text: Fireproof lipo battery bags or "safes" have been around for maybe 8 or 10 years now. Lipos will catch fire on occasion (although as technology improves, and battery users learn to deal with lipos without abusing them) those fires occur less often. This is one of the first "big" LiPo safe bags. That may, or may not be a good thing. When you put all your eggs into one basket as it were, you have the possibility that a fire in one lipo battery might damage your whole stock of LiPos. I have several smaller LiPo safe bags, and I spread the risk around. But I also have enough LiPo batteries that I need the capacitiy of this large bag.
customer_reviews.author: Michael J. Myers

customer_reviews.title: Perfect size with well placed handles
customer_reviews.text: This Lipo bag feels like a quality product . Great size for all my lipos to fit as well . Wish it had a charging slit/ with flap . But I am still very pleased with how sturdy it feels . The handles being on the side not on the top will prevent the zipper from being stressed from the weight . That’s why I bought this one over others . Would buy again . Highly recommended
customer_reviews.author: Coolerdad

customer_reviews.title: Great Lipo bag, big
customer_reviews.text: My only complaint, is sticky zippers. But maybe they are tough because it makes it more fireproof. I don't know, I did not design the zipper. But the bag is awesome, and holds my 20+ battery collection + my goggles. Good LIPO bag, just try it and if your disappointed, just return it. But I have a feeling you won't.
customer_reviews.author: RTegland

customer_reviews.title: Seems like a good precautionary measure; appears well made.
customer_reviews.text: Appears to be a robust fireproof bag for containing lithium batteries. I confess I haven't tested it by igniting a lithium battery, so I'm taking "fireproof" at their word. That said, while the risk of fire with lithium cells is pretty negligible, it isn't totally zero, and I understand that on the rare occasion one ignites, it's pretty spectacular ( think thermite, says my local fireman), so I figure it's worth the extra precaution. Product arrived promptly; appears well made.
customer_reviews.author: Jim

customer_reviews.title: Peace of Mind - Decent Quality
customer_reviews.text: I only need to take one of these bags to the field as it appears to be able to hold all of the batteries for a day of flying. I like that the zippers operate smoothly - even around corners. Fortunately I haven't had to test it's material strength as it relates to a LiPo fire. Good value.
customer_reviews.author: Marl J Bell

customer_reviews.title: I hope I'll never have to test to see if it works
customer_reviews.text: A have purchased three of these units after an acquaintance's home burned down as a result of a lithium ion battery explosion. Yikes! As a result of his experience, I now store my charged, lithium ion batteries in these bags. I can't say for sure that they work and hope I'll never have to test their effectiveness.
customer_reviews.author: Peter A. Butzin

customer_reviews.title: Good size, good quality
customer_reviews.text: This is a very simple product, but it looks good to me. The size is a bit larger than competitive products which I think is good if you use it for charging. The temp inside stays reasonably low, everything can spread out pretty well, and the bi-directional zipper allows easy arrangement of the charger cable. I have to assume that the fire protection of the material is adequate - but that's just an assumption. I have not tested it with fire ... yet, thankfully.
customer_reviews.author: Moses

customer_reviews.title: RUN AWAY. Great size bag, nice material but zipper is the worst zipper I have ever had on ANYTHING
customer_reviews.text: I have five other bags but wanted a larger bag. This bag fit that but the zipper quality is low and has made this bag unusable. I am lowering to one star. I love the size and the bag material is good but what good is a bag if the zipper does nothing but hang and will not secure the bag. Now both zippers have failed. At least before I could use one zipper to get it 75% closed now both zippers have failed at the beginning so it is worthless now.
customer_reviews.author: C. Woodruff

customer_reviews.title: Adequate; satisfactory.
customer_reviews.text: Seems to be lined with a woven fiberglass layer. Double zipper lets you zip in from both sides, important. Apparently does the job. Have not tested it with a massive fire yet.
customer_reviews.author: J. Myers

customer_reviews.title: Very nice quality for the price, especially for large 6s Lipos
customer_reviews.text: I'm flying mostly with 6s Lipos, 5000 mAh or larger. This bag is large enough, material strong enough, and two zippers. But most importantly, it has two handles. Other bags I've used, with a single handle, eventually come loose on one side. I got one of these to see if it was good or not -- and immediately ordered a second.
customer_reviews.author: Nick DeCarlis

customer_reviews.title: It fits my  battery pack.
customer_reviews.text: It looks sturdy, and the zipper works OK. 4 stars because, thank goodness, I have never had it tested (no battery has caught fire so far) so I don't actually know if it would work.. I bought it to hold a li-ion battery car jump starter. I wanted to keep it in the car, where sometimes in the summer it gets hot. I didn't want to find my car on fire from the battery. So far so good. The package arrived in good shape.
customer_reviews.author: Brad

customer_reviews.title: Handles are on upside down....
customer_reviews.text: The bag seems Ok. The zipper is a little tough to open going around the corners. No biggie, probably just because it inst broken in yet. Probably never will get the chance to be broken in because the one thing I needed out of this bag was the ability to conveniently and safely transport batteries. Sorta hard to do that when one handle is on upside down. I can't actually carry it without grappling the whole bag.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Perfect fit
customer_reviews.text: If you're like me and are paranoid about explosive batteries this one is perfect. Fits right inside a 50 cal ammo box. Be sure to drill holes on the top of the ammo can just in case of an explosion, but other than that it seems to be a quality bag. Let's hope it never has to do its job.
customer_reviews.author: Chris

customer_reviews.title: Buy this I can highly recommend it to anybody
customer_reviews.text: Made with quality materials and just the right size to accommodate any need for my hobby. I was very surprised at the quality of everything, the stitching the material the attention to detail with the placement of the velcro patches. I've paid twice as much and received half the quality multiple times I'd recommend this to anybody
customer_reviews.author: GRADE-A-Reviews

customer_reviews.title: Important safety item!!!
customer_reviews.text: This item is an extra layer of protection ! I bought 2 for our battery storage. We also use these bags to transport the drone batteries in our car. These are important safety items to have.
customer_reviews.author: Bonnie

customer_reviews.title: Great LiPo Bag.
customer_reviews.text: Excellent product. I feel better transporting my batteries. Because LiPo batteries are so volatile, proper care and handling are essential--and this bag fulfills another safety precaution for LiPos. Keep up the great work.
customer_reviews.author: Gene S.

customer_reviews.title: Bag is well made; holds a LOT of batteries
customer_reviews.text: I was looking for something to replace carrying my batteries in cloth bags. It’s a big bag which is just what I needed to carry 20 1300mah 4S batteries. The handle feels strongly stitched to the bag; I’m confident it will last.
customer_reviews.author: John

customer_reviews.title: Barely 2 months old and already tearing at seams and broken zipper.
customer_reviews.text: I have done nothing more than zip/unzip and carry with the handle, yet it is already tearing at one of the corners and the zipper don't catch both sides to close it.
customer_reviews.author: Kelly D.

customer_reviews.title: Small but works I guess
customer_reviews.text: Be certain to look at the Millimeters (why not use inches for U.S.A.??) Because when it arrives you will be surprised how small it is. I'm thinking a hobbyist with lipo batteries will need several of these to facilitate different models of batteries. Wish it was larger
customer_reviews.author: I'm a real customer

customer_reviews.title: Lipo safe bag
customer_reviews.text: Great bag and a great price. Shipping was fast. We like that it has a zipper closure. We purchased two of these bags, one for us and one for our son who had a lipo battery explode and start a small fire in his house. It would have been worse if he had not been home. We will not charge a lipo battery without using this bag.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Battery bag is everything it was said to be
customer_reviews.text: I was pleased with the bag when it arrived. It came in perfect condition and on time. I was looking for a charging bag that was a bit larger than most bags that are advertised. This is important because I also use the bag to transport my batteries. Very good purchase. I recommend seller highly.
customer_reviews.author: heli flyer

customer_reviews.title: Hope it works if I end up needing it.
customer_reviews.text: I put a couple old phones with internal li-po batteries in this bag in hopes that if the batteries should ever randomly ignite, this will contain the fire. Feel better than leaving them in a drawer. Seems well made and sturdy.
customer_reviews.author: Zane H.

customer_reviews.title: ENGPOW Fireproof Explosionproof Lipo Safe Bag Works as Advertized
customer_reviews.text: Works well, its a rectangular bag you put your batteries in. Zipper works well, it may last. Handles attach to side which has to be less stress on zipper than those that attach to lid. I only wish they was 2 compartments inside so I could put charged and discharged ones.
customer_reviews.author: Tail-Spin

customer_reviews.title: Awesome bag..
customer_reviews.text: Awesome bag for the price mines 2 years old an still looks an works like new.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Poor Quality Zipper
customer_reviews.text: Poor quality zipper. I've got gig bags, backpacks, lunch bags, duffle bags, suitcases, and don't have the issues like I've got with the cheap zippers that we're sewn onto this bag. Unfortunately, I'm juuuuust past the return date.
customer_reviews.author: Jay Go'bah Smithstem

customer_reviews.title: Decent Size
customer_reviews.text: I bought this thinking I might need more of them for about 8 4S 1000mah ish batteries .. I definitely can store more than 20 batteries there, if you are dealing with lipos for your hobby or profession, do yourself a favor a and get one of these.. for the price its great value for money. if had to complain it would be the zipper is not that great. but its a minor detail cant reduce a star for that. overall I am happy for what I got and what I paid for
customer_reviews.author: saeed

customer_reviews.title: Good product
customer_reviews.text: It can hold all four of my batteries so it is large enough. I place each battery in an individual bag and then each bag in this larger bag. Recommended.
customer_reviews.author: Sandman

customer_reviews.title: Don't let Lipo Battery Failure Fuel A Fire!
customer_reviews.text: The three (3) sizes of bags provide great protection and assurance that any Lipo battery I have is secure from spreading a fire! Zippered and overlapping double strong Velcro ensure any incendiary incident from battery failure whiles stores or during charging will be contained!
customer_reviews.author: Xajuar

customer_reviews.title: Great Product!
customer_reviews.text: Bag arrived in good time and in great condition. I feel much better about using and charging LIPO batteries knowing that, if a fire or explosion occurred, it would be contained by the bag. Good product and I liked the zipper fasteners, as well.
customer_reviews.author: jess

customer_reviews.title: a good larger case
customer_reviews.text: . The zipper sticks in the corner most of the time . this would be good for charging as there is more room for batteries and cables . if you have a lot of batteries it would be a good size
customer_reviews.author: John WenzelburgerTop Contributor: Photography

customer_reviews.title: Worth it.
customer_reviews.text: Honestly this product seems legitimate. Zipper seems strong and works great. Material itself holds it shape very well. If I had to change one thing... I tad bit bigger. But I put a traxxas charger and 2×6200mah 2s lipos in there and could probably fit another battery or two.
customer_reviews.author: Kevin Lemke Jr

customer_reviews.title: Big! (That’s what she said) 🤪
customer_reviews.text: Seems nice and sturdy, I am going on a trip cross country and I don’t want TSA to mess with me. I fly only Fpv race drones and can easily fit at least 15 1000-1550mah 4-6s in there. I also got xt60 caps on amazon too I think I should be good.
customer_reviews.author: Matt

customer_reviews.title: NICE BAG
customer_reviews.text: Very nice bag to take all lipos to the field or to use for charging. Good quality. Zipper is a little sticky but it will loosen up I’m sure. Recommended this product. Nice to have piece of mind that everything is safe.
customer_reviews.author: LuvDrones

customer_reviews.title: So Far it's Working
customer_reviews.text: Well, it holds my 40 Volt Ryobi battery, and I'm able to charge it inside the bag. Plenty of space for that inside. My battery hasn't blown up yet, but if it does I'll let you know if the bag stopped a house fire.
customer_reviews.author: Benjamin Chase

customer_reviews.title: Good quality, I think. Haven't tried to catch it on fire yet
customer_reviews.text: My house hasn't burned down yet but my batteries haven't caught fire yet either so I'm not sure how to review this. Quality seems good. I expect it to last longer than I'll need it.
customer_reviews.author: Alex Ong

customer_reviews.title: A must have for LiPo battery storage.
customer_reviews.text: This is a very nice fire resistant bag for LiPo battery storage. Large enough for multiple DJI Inspire 1 batteries. Prompt shipping and speedy delivery made this an awesome transaction. Thank You.
customer_reviews.author: KBC

customer_reviews.title: Thin n small
customer_reviews.text: Small. Thin n worthless. Suggestion. Buy a small safe (unless travel or mobile use)
customer_reviews.author: BEST TECH BUDDY

customer_reviews.title: Very nice LiPo bag!
customer_reviews.text: I now have 2 of these LiPo bags. One to store batteries at home and another to carry a few at a time to and from the flying field. They are well made and hold lots of batteries. With the relatively large storage space and the top that flips completely open, I find them more convenient than the envelope style bags.
customer_reviews.author: TE in CA

customer_reviews.title: Nice Lipo safe bag
customer_reviews.text: This bag is used for storing, or charging Li-Po batteries. It is well made and sturdy. Price is right too.
customer_reviews.author: Ellen in Missouri

customer_reviews.title: Great product for the price.
customer_reviews.text: I have over twenty lipo batteries and I bought two bags. They are roomy and provide a great storage container that I was looking for Without having to buy a metal ammo can.
customer_reviews.author: FreemanRC

customer_reviews.title: Great for Lithium storage
customer_reviews.text: RC types, this is a great bag. I've had one now for four years and have felt safe carrying it in back of my truck. I have three of them. For the price, this is terrific.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Very well made
customer_reviews.text: I got the order only 1 day later that expected however the product was well packaged and very good quality and product was a good value for the money.
customer_reviews.author: WILLIAM R MCCAMY

customer_reviews.title: I want to keep my batteries and my house safe!
customer_reviews.text: I like the lip bags for my smaller batteries, thank you! I'd love to see a bag large enough that will hold my 2 6s 5000 packs I use in my T-Rex 600s and 700s. I'd love to buy those as well. It's too much of a hassle to take the packs off the battery tray after flying. A larger bagel for those packs would be awesome. Please come out with the larger sizes, too!
customer_reviews.author: Robert J Clark III

customer_reviews.title: Excellent lipo bag!
customer_reviews.text: Great lipo bag. I can fit at least 4 six cell lipos in this bag. Well made and definitely worth the money. Fast shipping! Excellent company. I look forward in shopping with this place again. Thank you for your service!
customer_reviews.author: Mike M

customer_reviews.title: Excellent value. Roomy.
customer_reviews.text: This is perfect for traveling with lipo batteries. I fit 8 hardcase 5000mah 2s lipos in with room to spare. Pleases so far. great value
customer_reviews.author: Brian

customer_reviews.title: Zipper sucks
customer_reviews.text: Bought 2 and Zipper doesn’t work in either Cant even seal the thing
customer_reviews.author: Edwin Garcia

customer_reviews.title: As expected, and convenient.  Holds nearly as many batteries as a 50mm ammo box.
customer_reviews.text: I hope I never have to test the functionality of the bag. It holds nearly as many Lipos as those ammunition cans do. In fact, this bag fits perfectly inside the 50mm ammo can.
customer_reviews.author: J. Lester

customer_reviews.title: Great bag & safety for your LiPo batteries
customer_reviews.text: Great bag & safety for your LiPo batteries. Very good quality, product was just as described. Arrived quickly and in perfect condition.
customer_reviews.author: Scott

customer_reviews.title: Plenty of Room! Great Quality!!
customer_reviews.text: Plenty of Room for all of my Lipo Batteries, and Nice looking case Great Quality!!! Very Happy!! and feeling very secure knowing My Lipo Batteries R Safe & Sound I side This BAG!! Thank You ENGPOW!! I >RECOMMEND< These Lipo Bags I Have 2 of Them..
customer_reviews.author: Philip

customer_reviews.title: HIGH QUALITY
customer_reviews.text: good bag to store batteries and store chargers, as well as using it as a battery charge bag. GIVES YOU A SENSE OF S-E-C-U-R-I-T-Y.
customer_reviews.author: XANADUE

customer_reviews.title: Great quality
customer_reviews.text: seems like an excellent quality product, I am currently storing many 2s and 3 s batteries in it, it has plenty of storage area. I hope to never test the fire retarding ability in it :)
customer_reviews.author: KK4QBN

customer_reviews.title: Nice Bag, Just the right size
customer_reviews.text: Really nice product, I would buy it again...holds 3 medium batteries and I large Lawn mower Ion Battery.
customer_reviews.author: SDow

customer_reviews.title: Very Useful to Safely Carry Portable Battery Jumper inside a Car
customer_reviews.text: A good size fire and explosion proof bag for car jumper. A must have for safety!
customer_reviews.author: Amaznphile

customer_reviews.title: Great lipo charging storage bag
customer_reviews.text: It's a great bag compared to others I've owned. Perfect size for 4s, 5s, and 6s packs. Well made to. I have no complaints.
customer_reviews.author: Mike Rodgers

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: Great product, I can't believe I'm saying this. The bag is much larger than expected. Due to limited space, I really needed one much smaller
customer_reviews.author: Andrew P.

customer_reviews.title: Quite sturdy.
customer_reviews.text: Heavy duty straps and easily holds 168 of my 18650's. Which makes it quite heavy. Even though I'm not hauling lipos, I still appreciate the peace of mind.
customer_reviews.author: Elias Shedd

customer_reviews.title: Very Happy with it
customer_reviews.text: This is a great bag. I put all of my LiPo batteries inside and have lots of room still. Guess I need to get some more aircraft and batteries to fill it up :)
customer_reviews.author: Greg Grant

customer_reviews.title: Good Storage. Fits in "ammo" can.
customer_reviews.text: Good for the price. Eleven bucks. Worth it. Will do, hope we don't have to test the fireproof feature.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Very Roomy bag
customer_reviews.text: The bag was delivered quickly and was exactly as described. The Bag easily fits 5 DJI Phantom 4 batteries
customer_reviews.author: Steve Jacobus

customer_reviews.title: Great Value!
customer_reviews.text: Fits 2 4s traxxas batterys no problem! Even enough room to store charger with the batts. The zipper is way better than the velcro ones.
customer_reviews.author: Jfer87

customer_reviews.title: Very happy - use it to recharge my drone batteries in and transport them around
customer_reviews.text: I hope my batteries will never catch fire or explode, but if they do, I will be happy to have them in this bag at all time (can't really tell how well the bag would sustain an explosion... and frankly, I don't want to test it myself! ;-)
customer_reviews.author: Think Earth First

customer_reviews.title: Awesome bag for traveling
customer_reviews.text: Great size bag. I used to travel to South America and carry all my batteries. TSA did look inside the bag to inspect but no questions asked as they know what it’s for. Highly recommended and great build quality
customer_reviews.author: IRONRAM

customer_reviews.title: Convenient Size.
customer_reviews.text: Nice size for an afternoon of flying. Hope I never find out how effective it is controlling a lipo fire. Fast delivery.
customer_reviews.author: JJ

customer_reviews.title: This is a well built lipo bag for safety
customer_reviews.text: This lipo bag works great. Built a big battery for my ebike and put it on the rack. This is the second fireproof lipo bag I've received and is well made.
customer_reviews.author: Drew Sexton

customer_reviews.title: Worth the money!
customer_reviews.text: Big improvement over the envelope style I had before, seems to be made well. Really like the extra room.
customer_reviews.author: theshoeMAN

customer_reviews.title: Great Lipo Bag
customer_reviews.text: Excellent product! I could not be happier with my purchase.
customer_reviews.author: glenna d chapman

customer_reviews.title: Big enough for all my batteries
customer_reviews.text: This bag is large enough to store and transport all my race batteries. Smaller bags are used for charging individual packs. I'm quite happy with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Bob T

customer_reviews.title: Worked as expected
customer_reviews.text: I have bought 2 of these. One for charged li po's and one for discharged li po's. Quality, durable product.
customer_reviews.author: MemZar

customer_reviews.title: Seems to be nice quality
customer_reviews.text: I bought it hoping it would fit into my ammo cans and it's an exact fit! Perfect, I'll order some more for the others.
customer_reviews.author: ggimlick

customer_reviews.title: Lipo safety bag
customer_reviews.text: works for what I needed it for. Makes transporting, charging and storing the batteries much easier and safer.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good value.
customer_reviews.text: I use this to transport my LiPos in the car to and from the field. It’s light weight and perfect for this. At home, I store my LiPos in a fireproof safe.
customer_reviews.author: Steve Royer

customer_reviews.title: Haven't Tested It!
customer_reviews.text: Haven't tested it yet and hope I don't ever have to! But it looks well made, about the right size and nicely padded. I'm happy with the purchase.
customer_reviews.author: JJ

customer_reviews.title: Just what I ordered
customer_reviews.text: Safe bag came just as described, fast shipping, just what we needed to hold Lipo batteries in!
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer Wilson

customer_reviews.title: Like it. Just ordered a second one.
customer_reviews.text: I carry my batteries in individual small cases in this. Double protection and handles seem strong to handle the weight when full of batteries.
customer_reviews.author: Bret S. Martin

customer_reviews.title: Its nice
customer_reviews.text: Its a nice bag, it probably could hold 12 lipo batteries easily. At first it seemed hard to use the velcro, but after a few uses, it seems to be working nicely. I think it was a good purchase. I like the handles. Its nicely made.
customer_reviews.author: Lea Lea

customer_reviews.title: Good bag
customer_reviews.text: Arrived in perfect condition, on time. Sturdy bag. Just what I needed.
customer_reviews.author: Robert B.

customer_reviews.title: Fits large lithium battery and Ac charger
customer_reviews.text: Fits the large lithium battery. Hopefully it is fireproof should battery ignite. No way to test that and I hope I never have to.
customer_reviews.author: nwnoni

customer_reviews.title: Great bag but could use better zippers
customer_reviews.text: Great bag and lots of room but the zipper is a little tuff wish it had a better zipper but other than that a great lipo bag for price
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Keep those lipos safe!
customer_reviews.text: I ride an electric mountain board running two 6s lipos, having a safe storage option like these bags is a must. The bags are high quality and were shipped quickly.
customer_reviews.author: Paul Gomes

customer_reviews.title: Works great
customer_reviews.text: Handy, very large for lipo batteries, would hold way more than I will ever own.
customer_reviews.author: rmerritt

customer_reviews.title: Good buy and fits up to 18 5000 mah batteries
customer_reviews.text: One of my lipos exploded in this and completely kept it sealed.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Stays open to see your lipo's. Nice lipo bag.
customer_reviews.text: Great for storing lipo's. Just needed to be little bigger.
customer_reviews.author: Dan k.

customer_reviews.title: Poor quality zipper
customer_reviews.text: Size of the bag was smaller than I anticipated, but will hold 4 2200mah batteries while charging. Have not tried with my 6 cell batteries yet. The zipper is the downfall for this bag. Failing after half a dozen uses.
customer_reviews.author: Paul Tollios

customer_reviews.title: Nice Bag!
customer_reviews.text: I bought a LiPo jump starter and needed a bag to put in my car. This one worked perfectly!
customer_reviews.author: J

customer_reviews.title: Must have for all lipo battery charging
customer_reviews.text: Hopefully we never have to use it! Charge batteries in the bags. No velcro, just zipper.
customer_reviews.author: rowdy yates

customer_reviews.title: Holds my drone batteries
customer_reviews.text: Great product. I use it to keep all my drone batteries in all day. Keeps them safe. It holds 6 Inspire 2 batteries, 4 P4P batteries, and a couple monitor batteries.
customer_reviews.author: Robert Biggs

customer_reviews.title: Seems to be a quality product
customer_reviews.text: Like the other reviews, there is no way to test how effective the bag is without lighting off a battery, but it seems to be well designed and sturdy.
customer_reviews.author: Howard L. Estes

customer_reviews.title: Perfect!
customer_reviews.text: I have 2 planes a helecopter and a boat and this Lipo storage bag is the perfect size for keeping all 10 of my batteries with room to grow.
customer_reviews.author: doug wilson

customer_reviews.title: does its job
customer_reviews.text: nothing to dislike does its job it's lightweight and the zipper works ok
customer_reviews.author: tazor

customer_reviews.title: Nice bag, gives me peace of mind.
customer_reviews.text: Knowing that my LiPo batteries are stored in this fire/explosion proof bag gives me peace of mind. You heard/red the stories about batteries bursting into flames.
customer_reviews.author: Luis Autrique

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: Exactly what it looks like. Good size, just what I wanted.
customer_reviews.author: SSWA39

customer_reviews.title: Nice Lipo Storing/Charging Bag
customer_reviews.text: ...Well built bag with good zipper and overall construction; and a good price too. Would buy again.
customer_reviews.author: J. Marsh

customer_reviews.title: case
customer_reviews.text: Nice bag. Large enought to hold battery for charging and transport.
customer_reviews.author: M. COLLINS

customer_reviews.title: LiPo Batteries need safe storage and portability
customer_reviews.text: I use this product for my FPV LiPo batteries and it is very nice. Easy to carry. Kind to the batteries. I have bought several and may even get some more.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great liner for 50 cal ammo box
customer_reviews.text: PERFECT fit inside a steel 50 cal ammo box. When you want maximum protection, use this bag with a 50 cal ammo can (with holes drilled to vent pressure).
customer_reviews.author: ryan

customer_reviews.title: Peace of mind
customer_reviews.text: I have ordered two of these. With all of the battery fires you are hearing about it was important to me to have one of these in my home, along with giving one as a gift. We got alot of electronic gifts this year and this bag will give me peace of mind being able to store the batteries in them when they aren't in use.
customer_reviews.author: Rose Merritt

customer_reviews.title: Good value for the money
customer_reviews.text: I did not buy this product to transport batteries, but it holds the items I carry well. I wish they had a slightly larger option to go along with this bag, but I have no complaints.
customer_reviews.author: Victoria

customer_reviews.title: Ready to work
customer_reviews.text: This definitely seems ready to do the job. Fortunately I’ve not needed to test it out yet.
customer_reviews.author: MR ROBOT

customer_reviews.title: Must have for lipo charging
customer_reviews.text: A must have for lipo charging batteries. No velcro just zippers
customer_reviews.author: rowdy yates

product_meta.title: ENGPOW Fireproof Explosionproof Lipo Safe Bag for Lipo Battery Storage and Charging,Large Space Fire and Water Resistant Lipo Battery Guard with Double Zipper (260x130x150mm) (Black)
feature_bullets: 🔥【WIDE RANGE OF USES】We have upgraded the style,fireproof zipper added.Safe for charging, traveling, transporting, storing with various types of batteries(18650),mobile phones, Ipads,mobile power supply ,chemicals ,lighters, chargers to use widely.Safety bag for home safety fire protection

🔥【SAFEGUARD LIPO BATTERY 】This flame retardant bag is a convenient way of safeguarding your Lipo batteries during charging, transit, and storage.People always feel uneasy when the battery is charged, so it is necessary to have a bag to protect your safety.

🔥【SILICONE COATED FIBERGLASS】Made of silicon coated fiberglass with heat blocking aluminum foil inside,fireproof and explosion-proof functions help you and your family far away from the threaten of hazard of fire and explosion effectively
